title: Chamizal National Memorial: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Fee Free Chamizal National Memorial does not charge admission for entry into the park, facilities or park-sponsored events.  Admission fees may be charged by performance groups using the theater, and all monies received go directly to the groups to support their programs. If you are interested in supporting the work of Chamizal National Memorial, consider making a donation or joining our friends group.  The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Passes To serve our local community, passes are available for sale during regular hours of operation at Chamizal National Memorial Cultural Center. Federal Recreation Passes are only sold in the visitor center and cannot be obtained in the administration office. The Annual Pass, Annual Military Pass, Senior Pass, Access Pass, and Fourth Grade Pass are offered to assist in your visits to your public lands. Visit the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) website for more pass details.  Â     National Parks and Federal Recreation Lands Passes offered at Chamizal National Memorial
